bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition Combined Designation of numerous different types of lou chuang 漏瘡 , leaking sores, developing from luo li 瘰癧 , scrofula with pervasion-illness, breaking open to fester. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 22 ：夫九漏之為病，皆寒熱瘰癧在於頸腋者 , “Now, the diseases of nine types of leakage , they all are connected with alternating sensations of cold and heat and scrofula with pervasion-illness at the neck and in the armpits”. LSZ: 九漏，雖有九名，皆取象耳，但分部位可也 , “The nine types of leakage , although they have nine different designations, are all alike. It is only according to their location that they may be distinguished”.
